Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by Arizona in 2005...
Injured on 5/26/2005 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Traded from Arizona to Baltimore on 5/26/2006 (Going to ARI: LF A. Pujols. Going to BAL: P T. Wood, P C. Balester, P M. Mckey, 2B D. Pedroia)...
Traded from Baltimore to Chicago (N) on 4/1/2008 (Going to CHN: P C. Balester, P T. Wood. Going to BAL: P L. Hernandez)...
Injured on 4/23/2009 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Philadelphia on 4/30/2010 (Going to PHI: P T. Wood, LF E. Harris. Going to CHN: P R. Ortiz)...
Injured on 4/29/2012 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 4-5 weeks...
Earned first career win on 7/4/2013...
Won World Championship with Philadelphia in 2013...
Had first career hit on 9/20/2014, off Jorge Sosa (CIN)...
Won World Championship with Philadelphia in 2015...
Hit first career homerun on 7/29/2017, off Luke Bard (ATL)...
Won World Championship with Philadelphia in 2018...
Injured on 9/21/2023 with a Broken Elbow, out for 9 weeks...
